snippet: Seething with anger and alarmed over Mr. Rubio’s rise, aides to Mr. Bush and his allies are privately threatening attacks that will try to undercut Mr. Rubio as unaccomplished and unprepared.
abstract: Political advertising out of Jeb Bush's campaign seems aimed at undercutting Marco Rubio as unaccomplished and unprepared in hopes of halting his sudden ascent in polls; some Bush donors, aides and Republican operatives are cautioning campaign against such heated attacks.

byline.original: By MAGGIE HABERMAN and MICHAEL BARBARO

lead_paragraph: Seething with anger and alarmed over Mr. Rubio’s rise, aides to Mr. Bush and his allies are privately threatening attacks that will try to undercut Mr. Rubio as unaccomplished and unprepared.

headline.main: Jeb Bush Allies Threaten Wave of Harsh Attacks on Marco Rubio, an Ex-Mentee
headline.print_headline: Bush Allies Threaten Wave of Harsh Attacks on Rubio, an Ex-Protégé
